## AlexaPlatformData.category property

Part of the Alexa Skill Manifest, th category communicates what type of functionality the skill performs.

See [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html\#publishinginformation](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html#publishinginformation)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
category?: string;
```
